userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Gift of Col. C. C. Clendenen 1971

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Blood on the Border : typescript , M0221, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Typescript of Colonel Clendenen's book which was published in 1969 by MacMillan Co. Typescript includes revisions in pencil made by Clendenen's editor, a Mr. Ritner.

did.unittitle: 1969typescript of Col. Clendenen's Blood on the Border
